events.title: Registration
events.description: Register to the hackathon and get your swag! Make sure to have your ID ready

events.title: Baggage check-in
events.description: Bring your baggage and we will store it for you

events.title: Opening Ceremony
events.description: Introductory talk. Meet our sponsors and discover the prizes

events.title: Hacking Starts
events.description: Ready. Set. GO!

events.title: Dinner
events.description: Enjoy our first meal

events.title: Team Building
events.description: Looking for a team or new teammates?

events.title: Git & GitHub
events.author: GitHub
events.description: Introduction to git and GitHub, learn the most basic commands for git and collaborate with GitHub

events.title: Initial Brainstorming
events.author: Opentrends
events.description: Opentrends is helping you choose the right project. In our workshop we're going to implement design thinking methodologies to find your most appropiate challenge. Don't miss out!

events.title: Data for good cities
events.author: Everis
events.description: More and more companies are attempting to become data-driven. Turning data into knowledge and knowledge into intelligent actions is crucial for digital transformation. Let's see some interesting examples of how to do it for a good purpose.

events.title: Crush your coding interview workshop
events.author: Facebook
events.description: Never experienced a technical interview before? Want to extra-prepare for your next one? Technical interviews are one of the major hurdles of landing an awesome internship or full time career. Open for currently enrolled University students, come learn about the common pitfalls and tips to help you crush your next coding interview! Learn how to put your best foot forward at this Crush Your Coding Interview Workshop.

events.title: The future of 3D Printing
events.author: HP
events.description: Discover one of the most trend manufacturing technology with HP.

events.title: Are you Redis?
events.author: Vueling
events.description: You want to know how to improve your applications? Then cache could be a valid approach, learn how Redis is used in a big company like Vueling.

events.title: APIs for first timers
events.author: Typeform
events.description: Is this your first hackathon? You heard the word API or SDK prounounced many times during the opening ceremony but you have no idea what it means? Then you should come to this workshop to discover the beautiful world of APIs ðŸ¤©. In this talk we will cover the basic principles of APIs, how to call them, talk about security and showcase of examples of APIs you could use in your project.

events.title: Programmatic Art & Online Multiplayer Gamedev 101
events.author: dasilvacontin
events.description: Visual journey through the creating an MOG. Some programmatic art tricks and techniques too. HTML+JS+Node.js

events.title: Midnight Snacks
events.description: Feeling hungry? Come get some DIY yogurts

events.title: The Game starts
events.description: Hello dear Hacker

events.title: Breakfast
events.description: Come get some energizing breakfast

events.title: Showers
events.description: Don't forget to bring your towel

events.title: Microservices at Scale
events.author: Skyscanner
events.description: Building a world class engineering service up and running from scratch in less than 10 minutes, fancy having a look at how we do it?

events.title: Clean code for Analytics
events.author: McKinsey & Company
events.description: Keeping solutions scalable is key, even if it is just a model to be run by others. This session will go about how to ensure anyone can understand what you code.

events.title: Implementing R projects as libraries
events.author: McKinsey & Company
events.description: Learn how to structure a project as an R library by one of our expert coders!

events.title: Lunch
events.description: Come and get some delicious paella

events.title: Meetup Hacktoberfest
events.author: GitHub
events.description: Cheers

events.title: How to organize your hackathon
events.author: Hackers@UPC
events.description: Would you like to organize a hackathon? Come listen some of our experiences and tips. Don't be shy, we're here to help you!

events.title: Robot building
events.author: McKinsey & Company
events.description: Nothing to learn, just come for a fun time building a robot that wonâ€™t fall off a cliff!.

events.title: Lego Tournament
events.author: Itequia
events.description: Call to "Master Builders", capable of building anything from their imagination without instructions

events.title: Rubik Tournament
events.author: iThinkUPC
events.description: Show your skills solving Rubik cubes!

events.title: Dinner
events.description: PIZZA TIME

events.title: Photocall: Join the last survivors
events.description: Have you already seen our photocall? Come and get a souvenir photo from our photographers.

events.title: SlideShare Show
events.description: A hackers favourite game. Are you ready to improvise?

events.title: Sticker Exchange
events.description: You give stickers, you receive stickers. Ez pz

events.title: Midnight Snack
events.description: It's been more than 24 hours. Get some sweet waffles to keep yourself motivated

events.title: EPIC NERF GUNS BATTLE
events.description: Come and play a HackUPC classic. Nerf guns, 2 teams, a full classroom. Will you miss it?

events.title: The Game ends
events.description: You lost

events.title: Breakfast
events.description: Come charge your energies for the last hours of hacking

events.title: Hack submissions
events.description: Submit your project in our Devpost!

events.description: SUBMIT YOUR PROJECT BEFORE IT'S TOO LATE

events.title: Showers
events.description: Relax a bit before the demos start

events.title: Hack Demos
events.description: It's demo time!

events.title: Lunch
events.description: Mmmmmmm... frankfurt...

events.title: Closing Ceremony
events.description: And the winners are... Come watch the finalists and winners!

events.title: Ciao Hackers
events.description: It's been a pleasure, see you next time
